content: first side of heel flap knit across heel stitches pick up 14 15/18/19 stitches along other side of heel flap an extra stitch may be picked on each side up to close gap at instep if necessary decrease round continue working in stripe pattern as set join black/cc1 when needed knit across instep k1 ssk knit to last 3 stitches of heel / gusset k2tog k1 knit 1 round continue working 1 decrease round and 1 knit round until total stitches are equal to original stitch count 48/56/64/72 after decreases are complete work in stripe pattern until foot length is 1 5 2 less than desired length ending with a white/mc round toe set up join red/cc2 knit 1 round decrease round *k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before last instep stitch k2tog k1 repeat from * for sole stitches knit 1 round continue working these two rounds until there are 24 28/32/36 stitches total then decrease every round until 12 16/16/20 stitches remain weave in ends kitchener toe knit sock #2 and have fun wearing your new valentine s socks copyright 2019 denise bein kroll / purple pansy designs this is a free pattern you are welcome to knit this pattern for personal use gifts or charity projects please do not make to sell if you would like to share the pattern share directly from the source thanks pattern support dbeinkroll@gmail com
